categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Hartwig was a Human male Sith Acolyte during the Cold War. In 3645 BBY, Hartwig was attending the Sith academy on Odacer-Faustin. He was killed by Sith combat Master Xat Hracken that year, when the man succumbed to a virus that turned him into a flesh-eating monster.
